title: Can tech support help me.
body:
Hi 

I was wondering if there is a possibility i can change the email that is attached to my leauge of legends account.

replies.body:
Absolutely! If you have access to the current email associated with your account, you can easily do this by changing it in [account management.](https://account.leagueoflegends.com/na/en/protect) If for some reason you don't have access to the current email, you'll need to do this through a [support ticket.](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) Select "I need help recovering my account" and fill out as much info as you can.

Let me know if you have any questions.
